𓀙 Karian 𓍿 𓂋 𓀀 𓁐 𓏥 < Kurtan 𒂟 > Geros > 𓎛 𓂝 𓄻 𓃒 Hieros > Hero's ethnonyms

𒄈 GÍR 个 gèr 𒄉 dagger

𔕟 •dagger dager ⋍ 𔕠 zíʳ sir (man)

𓄿 𓈎 𓎛 𓅱 | battle-axe | arqrhr aqHu axe ⇔ 𓈎 𓎛 𓅱 GER !

𓎼 𓂋 𓀁 | silence | خَرِسَ ḵarisa خرس ḵiris ⇔ خَرَسَ ḵarasa 𓎼 𓂋 𓍅 𓀁 lie

𓌾 The syllable Ger has a couple of (mostly related) meanings in Germanic languages, most notoriously :

𐃆 𓄢 𓊤 𓊧 个儿 gèr 个man 𓂙

Because of the abundant causative prefix ge, the root of ger can even be more complicated.

Bulgar @ Volgar
Kutrigur Bulgar (Kurds)
Utigur Bulgar (Ottoman) @ Avar Khaganate
Onogur Bulgar (@Onager) @ Khazar / Kazach
Magyar @ Ural
Kangar @ Altai
Bashkir @ Sibir
Angul/Angles @ Dane
Garamantes @ Sahara!

Goth-man 𓄱 𓄰 𓃒 𓃾𓃿𓄀 GU4 𒄞 cow GUD cattle 𓈞𓏏𓏯 cattle 𓃾 𓈞𓏏𓄰 ⇔ kettle 𓈞 𓋩𓏤𓃒𓏥 cattle ⇔ Kette 𓋩𓋧
